meanings.definition: A long journey involving travel by sea or in space.
meanings.sent1: The pirates set out on their voyages to find hidden treasure.
meanings.sent2: She dreamed of embarking on exciting voyages to distant lands.
meanings.sent3: The cat's voyages around the house always ended up at the food bowl.
meanings.sent4: His imagination took him on voyages to galaxies beyond our own.
meanings.sent5: The voyages of the ancient explorers are still remembered today.

meanings.definition: To travel or journey, especially by sea.
meanings.sent1: They voyages across the ocean to reach the new world.
meanings.sent2: We voyages to different countries to experience new cultures.
meanings.sent3: The penguin voyages gracefully through the icy waters.
meanings.sent4: Her mind voyages to peaceful places when she meditates.
meanings.sent5: The hot air balloon voyages gently through the sky.

meanings.definition: A series of travels or journeys.
meanings.sent1: His voyages for work took him to many cities around the world.
meanings.sent2: The family's voyages during the summer created lasting memories.
meanings.sent3: The bookworm's voyages through different genres of books never ended.
meanings.sent4: The voyages of the migrating birds were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The voyages of the marathon runner inspired many to stay active.
